pages.text: $(#008cff)Silkberries$() are found all around The Aurorian! They can be eaten raw, turned into $(#008cff)Silkberry Jam$(), or even planted in farmland!

pages.name: Silkberry Tea
pages.text: $(#008cff)Silkberries$() can also be made into tea that gives a short regeneration buff.

pages.name: Silkberry Jam
pages.text: $(#008cff)Silkberry Jam$() isn't very good by itself, but can be made into $(#008cff)Silkberry Jam Sandwiches$() with $(#008cff)Lavender Bread$()!
